titles.title: A bill for the relief of Major Ralph Edwards, United States Air Force, retired.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/5/1987--Introduced. Deems a named individual to have held the grade of lieutenant colonel in the U.S. Air Force for purposes of the computation of retired pay.
